node.title: Vicki has been sleeping in the boot of her car for five months â€” not for much longer
node.alt: Vicki sits at back of her car.
node.description: Stranded Queenslanders stuck interstate gear up to be reunited with their homes and loved ones ahead of Christmas after spending months living in limbo out of cars and tents.
node.content:
["Vicki Hutchins has been stuck in New South Wales living out of the boot of her car for five months.", "She's been waiting to get back into Queensland.", "\"It's been traumatic,\" she said.", "Ms Hutchins and her friend Mark have spent months sleeping in cars and tents in Kyogle, waiting for the border to open.", "Even though she can now enter Queensland without quarantining, she's still stuck because she can't afford to drive to the border.", "\"I have to wait until\u00a0Tuesday to get my disability pension, because I can't afford at the moment to put fuel in the car,\" she said.", "", "
Back of Vicki Hutchin's car that has been lived out of for five months while stranded interstate.(Supplied)
", "Ms Hutchins went to NSW in July to help her son, who suffers from schizophrenia.", "She thought she had a valid border pass to get back, but was denied entry back into to Queensland.", "\"I had no money \u2014 nothing. I only had enough fuel in my car to be able to go back to my residence in Queensland.\"", "She spent the first daunting night in Boggabilla.", "\"The truck drivers all reached out to me, they gave me some food,\" she said.", "She's been sleeping rough ever since,\u00a0moving around to avoid trouble from authorities.", "Her friend Mark drove over the border to help look after her and they've both been sleeping in cars.", "\"We couldn't afford to stay in a motel, we couldn't afford to stay in cabins,\" Ms Hutchins said", "\"I suffer with severe depression and anxiety and this has just topped it off \u2026 like some days you just don't know how you kind of get through, but you just have to.\"", "She said while it is good news that the border is finally opening up, she remains\u00a0sceptical.", "", "
This swag has been part of Vicki and Mark's home for the past few months.(Supplied)
", "\"It is positive but in the back of your mind, you've still got this doubt that something's going to go wrong,\" she said.", "She said the Queensland government has to answer for how it\u00a0left people homeless.", "
A home straddling\u00a0Queensland and NSW borders
", "Caroline Bellenger has been looking forward to being legally allowed to leave her front gate.", "Her home is in a complex of 360 townhouses called Kirra Shores that's actually in Tweed Heads, but the driveway opens onto the Queensland side of the border.", "\"Once you go inside the gate, you're in a NSW address and outside in Binya Avenue it's Queensland,\" she said.", "", "
Caroline Bellenger's townhouse complex straddles the border and the property is in two states,(ABC News)
", "The border closure has led to some frustrating technicalities.", "\"We're not allowed out for recreation, only essential purposes, which makes it very difficult because of the gate here,\" she said.", "\"To get to NSW, we have to actually go through Queensland, so we're essentially locked out of NSW.", "Ms Bellenger, who volunteers with the Black Dog Institute, said\u00a0the situation has been hard for people's mental health.", "\"It's been really stressful,\" Ms Bellenger said.", "\"At one stage, parents couldn't send their kids to school, and the school's like 200 metres up [the road].", "\"As it stands now, kids still can't play sport here at the footy field, or they can't go to nippers on this side.", "
Bunkering down during a pandemic at a motel
", "Stephen Whale has been stuck in NSW for months, but has kept himself busy travelling on his motorcycle and picking up work where he can.", "\"Yeah, frustrating at times, but I've been working down here so it hasn't been like I was waiting the whole time to come back,\" he said.", "", "
Stephen Whale\u2019s been shut out of Queensland for months, travelling around NSW on his motor bike.(Supplied)
", "He's staying at a motel in the Blue Mountains,\u00a0but looking forward to crossing back into Queensland this week.", "Mr Whale said he has kept\u00a0busy by playing a drum and bushwalking.", "\"So I've got my motorbike here, I've got the drum \u2026\u00a0 and the cricket's on the box \u2026 there's plenty to do,\" he said.", "Despite being locked out of his state until now, he said he supported the government closing the border.", "\"They've done a good job keeping COVID out.", "", "
Andrew Parchimovicz\u00a0has been waiting months to visit his family in Brisbane, including newborn niece Holly.(Supplied)
", "Brisbane man Andrew Parchimovicz works in Sydney as a travel agent.", "He's been waiting months to get back to Brisbane and see his family.", "\"I've been on edge most days just thinking, 'Are they going to open the borders, are they going to keep the doors closed?' It's just been so surreal,\" he said.", "Mr\u00a0Parchimovicz has booked\u00a0a plane ticket and will be jetting to Brisbane once the borders open.", "\"Usually I'm in Brisbane several times a year and I just haven't been able to get up there with these latest lockdowns in Sydney,\" he said.", "\"So I'm really looking forward to getting up there \u2026 I haven't been up there since early this year, so it's been a long time coming.\"", "As a proud uncle, he's looking forward to seeing his brother and his niece at the airport.", "\"I just can't wait to walk off that plane and run up and just give him a hug and hold my niece again \u2013 it will just mean so much.\""]
